file.description: Spherical harmonics file in PDS SHA format

point.description: Center of the body to which the gravity field is attached

axes.description: Axes to which the gravity field is attached

range.description: Optional max distance above which spherical harmonics are not used  (if not given, SoI is used)

order.description: Optional max order (otherwise max available is used)

degree.description: Optional max degree (otherwise max available is used)

rorder.description: Optional max indirect order (otherwise same as degree)

rdegree.description: Optional max indirect degree (otherwise same as order)
